thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 46 of 3261
thread.title: William DANNEY

author: William DANNEY
title: William DANNEY
text:
It was a bit complicated and confusing search for rental car since it was kicking me out because it could not find either any location or the dates for my wish even though I knew there were cars and locations that I wanted to have, available. Since the pick up and drop off places are different, the online search could not handle it well.
But at the end I have managed it and got some vehicle for my trip.
